name: api
description: api project that references the loss of data from the beer company

scripts.start: npm i && npm i -g nodemon && npm run start_bd && nodemon index.js
scripts.init: npm i && npm i -g nodemon && nodemon index.js
scripts.start_bd: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.gitconfig: git config --local user.name "Maria Fernanda Oliveira" && git config --local user.email "mariafernanda.oliveira281@gmail.com"
